# og-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                        | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | The value of the checkbox                          | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Determines, whether the control is disabled or not | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `label`    | `label`    | The label of the checkbox                          | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                                | Type                      |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------- |
| `changed` | Event is being emitted when value changes. | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                       | Description                                    |
| ------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------- |
| `--og-checkbox-Background`                 | Main background color of the checkbox          |
| `--og-checkbox-Background--checked`        | Background color when the checkbox is checked  |
| `--og-checkbox-Background--disabled`       | Background color when the checkbox is disabled |
| `--og-checkbox-Background--hover`          | Background color when the checkbox is hovered  |
| `--og-checkbox-BorderColor`                | Main border color of the checkbox              |
| `--og-checkbox-BorderColor--checked`       | Border color when the checkbox is checked      |
| `--og-checkbox-BorderColor--hover`         | Border color when the checkbox is hovered      |
| `--og-checkbox-BorderWidth`                | Main border width of the checkbox              |
| `--og-checkbox-Height`                     | Height of the checkbox (box model: border-box) |
| `--og-checkbox-Width`                      | Width of the checkbox (box model: border-box)  |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-BorderColor`          | Border color of the checkbox icon              |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-BorderColor--checked` | Border color when the checkbox icon is checked |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-BorderColor--hover`   | Border color when the checkbox icon is hovered |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-BorderWidth`          | Border width of the checkbox icon              |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-Height`               | Height of the checkbox icon                    |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-Left`                 | Left position of the checkbox icon             |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-Top`                  | Top position of the checkbox icon              |
| `--og-checkbox__icon-Width`                | Width of the checkbox icon                     |
| `--og-checkbox__label__content-Margin`     | Margin of the checkbox label                   |
